modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds more modifiers slots to all weapons, tools and armor. Items before using this mod will keep up to 4 slots, need newly created items.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds more modifiers slots to all [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), tools and armor.

Items before using this mod will keep up to 4 [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/), need newly created/buy/… items will be applied to max 8 slots.

[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1_ksMtKwoJi5suB5ajdfmPAMfyUBw7ZMs)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15763-a18-mod-8-mod-slot/).

**Credits:** G\_uest
